fund: Name of the private-equity or investment fund that made the investment.
portfolio: Legal name of the portfolio company or special purpose vehicle (SPV) in which the fund invested.
company_description: Narrative summary of the portfolio company’s business model, products, and market position.
sector: Industry sector classification of the portfolio company (e.g., Consumer, Industrials).
status_unrealized_partial_realized_reali: Current disposition status of the investment indicating whether it is unrealized, partially realized, fully realized, or written off.
first_investment_date: Calendar date on which the fund first deployed capital into the portfolio company.
ipo_date: Date the portfolio company executed its initial public offering, if applicable.
ticker: Public market ticker symbol assigned to the company after it became listed, if applicable.
exit_date: Date on which the fund fully exited or disposed of its position in the company.
exit_method: Type of liquidity event or transaction used to exit the investment (e.g., IPO, trade sale, secondary sale, write-off).
holding_period_years: Calculated length of time, in years, that the fund held the investment from first investment to exit.
